name: Guac Control
description:
Guac Control has quickly become the longest running video game franchise on the internet.

In this, the original and critically unknown entry in the Guac Control series, you join Greg at the very beginning of his journey.

What will you do? What can you do? Can Greg even be controlled?

Yes, he can. With the arrow or WASD keys.

But will you want to control him?

That is the question at the heart of Guac Control.
